Tanzaku mei is the term I'm familiar with.  A tanzaku is a type of long, narrow calligraphy paper.

Even Google doesn't get many results with tansatsu, but this reference looks interesting:

http://www.hitachi-metals.co.jp/e/tatara/nnp0109.htm

Maybe it's already well known among sword guys.

Jim



  when signed on the little plates of metal. Are these referred to as 
  Tanzaku, Tansatsu, or are both correct. ?.

  Cheers

  Rich
